buyer.prompt: What yield do the farms have?
buyer.description: Broadcast query to all farms requesting current yield data. Aggregates responses from Brazil, Colombia, and Vietnam farms.

buyer.prompt: I'd like to buy 200 lbs quantity of coffee and who can fulfill it?
buyer.description: Broadcast inventory check across all farms to identify which farms have sufficient stock (â‰¥200 lbs) to fulfill the order.

buyer.prompt: What is the current inventory for Brazil farm?
buyer.description: Direct query to Brazil farm for inventory. Demonstrates identity verification failure - Brazil farm lacks verified identity badge and request will be rejected.

buyer.prompt: What is the current inventory for Colombia farm?
buyer.description: Direct query to Colombia farm for inventory. Validates agent-level identity policies via TBAC (Token-Based Access Control) before allowing access.

buyer.prompt: What is the current inventory for Vietnam farm?
buyer.description: Direct query to Vietnam farm for current inventory levels. Standard unicast communication without identity verification.

purchaser.prompt: I'd like to buy 200 lbs quantity of coffee at USD 500 price from Colombia
purchaser.description: Create order with Colombia farm for 200 lbs at $500. Validates tool-level identity policies via TBAC before executing order creation.

streaming_prompts.prompt: What yield do the farms have?
streaming_prompts.description: Broadcast yield query with real-time streaming. Returns farm responses incrementally as each farm replies, demonstrating async response handling.
